<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83707</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83707</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Un objet rapide s'échappant de la terre</string>
            <string language="en">A fast-moving object escaping from the Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine sich schnell bewegende Nachricht, die von der
Masse entgeht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um objeto fast-moving que escapa-se da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un oggetto rapido che fuoriesce dalla terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα γρήγορο αντικείμενο που δραπετεύει από τη γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un objeto rápido que se escapa de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que quand un objet est jeté en dehors de la Terre à grande vitesse, il s'échappera juste de la Terre et ralentira seulement.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that when an object is thrown outside the Earth at a very high speed, it will just escape from the Earth and will just slow down.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">La Terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vitesse d'évasion</string>
            <string language="en">escape speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">s'échappant</string>
            <string language="en">escaping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">énergie cinétique</string>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß, wenn eine Nachricht 
außerhalb der Masse an einem sehr Hochgeschwindigkeits geworfen wird,
sie gerade von der Masse entgeht und gerade unten verlangsamt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que quando um objeto é 
jogado fora da terra em um muito de alta velocidade, apenas se 
escapará da terra e se retardará apenas para baixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che quando un oggetto 
è gettato fuori della terra molto ad un ad alta velocità, 
fuoriuscirà appena dalla terra ed appena rallenterà.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι όταν ρίχνεται ένα 
αντικείμενο έξω από τη γη με μια πολύ υψηλή ταχύτητα, θα 
δραπετεύσει ακριβώς από τη γη και θα επιβραδύνει ακριβώς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que cuando un objeto se
lanza fuera de la tierra en un muy de alta velocidad, apenas se 
escapará de la tierra y apenas retrasará.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entweichengeschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entgehen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">velocidade do escape</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escapar-se</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia cinética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">velocità di fuga</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fuoriuscita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταχύτητα διαφυγών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαφυγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κινητική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">velocidad del escape</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el escaparse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía cinética</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
